Scenario: A ship named ABC, amidst its operational cycle, has initiated condition-based inspections on shock mounts for various pumps and gas turbines. Several shock mount readings are approaching the warning threshold. The ship is slated to depart within the next 48 hours for a 7-day operation. Replacement of these shock mounts is imperative to maintain mission reliability at 0.9.
